dgantt
Class Translator

java.lang.Object
  dgantt.Translator

public abstract class Translator
extends java.lang.Object

Translator to extract the necessary Gantt chart details from a user-defined task. The units of the start and end values are arbitrary. However, if using the built-in support for dates, the start and end values must be the date in milliseconds (see Date.getTime()).

The default implementations of the set methods are read-only; the underlying task is never modified unless such methods are overridden.

getRow

public abstract int getRow(java.lang.Object task)
Returns the row of the specified task. The returned value must be in the range 0 <= getRow(...) < ganttModel.getRowCount().

getToolTipText

public java.lang.String getToolTipText(java.lang.Object task)
